EmailTemplate.name: 202103_Internal-Comms_Supplier-Conference_Zoom.Thank you email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the 2021 Supplier Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for attending the 2021 Supplier Summit! Hello,
Thank you for attending the Honeywell Supplier Summit! We hope you enjoyed the time together as much as we did.
We welcome your feedback on the event by completing this short survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/N888FBS]]>. Your input will help us create meaningful events in the future!
Once again, we would like to congratulate our 2020 Honeywell Aerospace Supplier Award Winners.Â
PTI Technologies, Inc. IMPRO Aerotek, Inc. A&B Aerospace, Inc.
In 2020, these suppliers demonstrated a commitment to quality, on-time delivery, and cost-management, better enabling us to deliver world-class products to our customers. Thank you to these suppliers, and we look forward to seeing that same commitment from all our valued suppliers as we forge ahead.
Wishing you all the best in 2021 and beyond!
Honeywell Aerospace Integrated Supply Chain Team
